thread.section_title: DME Hub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DME Hub | dmehub.net
thread.title: John Randall
thread.title_full: DME Hub reviewed by John Randall

author: John Randall
title: John Randall
text: I have dealt with a lot of big company's that made big promises and realized that you can not trust anything that they say what a big disappointment . DME HUB is a company that tells you straight up the price and sticks to it, thanks DAVE. When you have to deal with a big company don't be scared to ask questions, be persistence don't let anyone push you around. Being in a chair is no place to be but thanks for making it a little easier thanks Dave.
